Event: Kolaahal 2015 | Cultural Fest 

Kolaahal 2015 is a Cultural Fest Organised by: Meerut Institute of Engineering and Technology, Meerut, Uttar Pradesh 

Kolaahal 2015 dates: 
Fest dates: 21st-22nd February 2015 
Last Dates for Registration: 20th February, 2015 

Details: 
Kolaahal is an annual cultural festival of Meerut Institute of Engineering and Technology which is to be held from 21st Feb to 22nd Feb 2015. 

Kolaahal 2015 Cultural Events in Meerut : 
Mai Shayar Badnaam 
Jaltarang: Solo Singing Competition. 
FUGUE: Duet Singing Competition. 
Strings on Fire: Instrumental. 
Foxtrort Footloose: A Solo Dance Competition. 
Chorio phoria: Group Dancing 
Rang Manch Mr and Miss MIET Battle of Bands
